scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE=study webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/dev.config.js --progress --profile --colors
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production LK_MODULE=study webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/prod.config.js --progress --profile --colors
